name: 808-A Hall-4
description:
As a barista at a milk tea shop, each day you encounter various characters and interact with them as you get accustomed to the life in the new city you found yourself in. Living the life of a bobarista, you pay little attention to the outside world and find yourself engaging only with the customers who come to have a seat at your counter.

Perhaps the world is more interesting than you might imagine. Or perhaps, it may just be the people you meet. With only your own skill in making a conversation and making milk tea, it’ll take time to truly find out. People's deepest thoughts and closest connections often do not get revealed for a monetary price but perhaps in time, the sweet taste of your drinks could do just that.

Prototype status: Only the bartending features have been implemented. The story/dialogue will be next on the development process.
